template.name: v1Phi2

transition.label: e : id_t
(exists (j : id_t) S[j] && e<=j)
send[i][e]?

If a priority 'e' > max Si is received then some priority 'e' > max Si will be delivered within (n-i+1)*MaxD

send[i][e]?
